0x00000000.description: Bits 31:0 of count. All octets received for all frames, good or bad, that are passed to the ingress packet memory. Bytes/Frames that are consumed by the MACs are not counted( eg FCS will not be counted if stripped or Pause frames if not passed to the Rx FIFO interface).
0x00000000.name: RxCIfInOctetsLo

0x00000004.description: Bits 39:32 of count. All octets received for all frames, good or bad, that are passed to the ingress packet memory. Bytes/Frames that are consumed by the MACs are not counted( eg FCS will not be counted if stripped or Pause frames if not passed to the Rx FIFO interface).
0x00000004.name: RxCIfInOctetsHi

0x00000008.description: Total number of octets for valid frames received. Good octets.
0x00000008.name: RxCStatsOctetsLo

0x0000000c.description: Total number of octets for valid frames received. Good octets.
0x0000000c.name: RxCStatsOctetsHi

0x00000010.description: Number of frames received with error: FIFO Overflow Error, CRC Error, Frame Too Long Error, Alignment Error, The dedicated Error Code (0xfe, not a code error) that is signaled on the Rx FIFO interface.
0x00000010.name: RxCIfInErrors

0x00000014.description: Incremented with each valid frame received on the Receive FIFO interface and bit 0 of the destination address was '0'.
0x00000014.name: RxCIfInUniCastPkts

0x00000018.description: Incremented with each valid frame received on the Receive FIFO interface and bit 0 of the destination address was '1' but not the broadcast address (all bits set to '1'). Pause frames are not counted.
0x00000018.name: RxCIfInMultiCastPkts

0x0000001c.description: Incremented with each valid frame received on the Receive FIFO interface and all bits of the destination address were set to '1'.
0x0000001c.name: RxCIfInBroadCastPkts

0x00000020.description: Total number of packets received. Good and bad packets.
0x00000020.name: RxCStatsPkts

0x00000024.description: Incremented when a packet of 64 octets length is received (good and bad frames are counted).
0x00000024.name: RxCStatsPkts64octets

0x00000028.description: Frames (good and bad) with 65 to 127 octets.
0x00000028.name: RxCStatsPkts65to127octets

0x0000002c.description: Frames (good and bad) with 128 to 255 octets.
0x0000002c.name: RxCStatsPkts128to255octets

0x00000030.description: Frames (good and bad) with 256 to 511 octets.
0x00000030.name: RxCStatsPkts256to511octets

0x00000034.description: Frames (good and bad) with 512 to 1023 octets.
0x00000034.name: RxCStatsPkts512to1023octets

0x00000038.description: Frames (good and bad) with 1024 to 1518 octets.
0x00000038.name: RxCStatsPkts1024to1518octets

0x0000003c.description: Proprietary RMON extension counter that counts the number of frames with 1519 bytes to the maximum length programmed in register FRM_LENGTH.
0x0000003c.name: RxCStatsPkts1519toMaxoctets

0x00000040.description: Frame received without error (including pause frames).
0x00000040.name: RxChanFramesReceivedOK

0x00000060.description: Bits 31:0 of count. All octets transmitted except preamble (i.e. Header, Payload, Padding and FCS) for all valid frames and valid pause frames transmitted.
0x00000060.name: TxCIfOutOctetsLo

0x00000064.description: Bits 39:32 of count. All octets transmitted except preamble (i.e. Header, Payload, Padding and FCS) for all valid frames and valid pause frames transmitted.
0x00000064.name: TxCIfOutOctetsHi

0x00000068.description: Number of frames transmitted with error: FIFO Overflow Error, FIFO Underflow Error, or User application defined error (ff_tx_err asserted together with ff_tx_eop).
0x00000068.name: TxCIfOutErrors

0x0000006c.description: Incremented with each frame written to the FIFO interface and bit 0 of the destination address set to '0'.
0x0000006c.name: TxCIfOutUniCastPkts

0x00000070.description: Frame transmitted without error (including pause frames).
0x00000070.name: TxChanFramesTransmittedOK

0x00000078.description: Incremented with each frame written to the FIFO interface and bit 0 of the destination address set to '1' but not the broadcast address (all bits set to '1').
0x00000078.name: TxCIfOutMultiCastPkts

0x0000007c.description: Incremented with each frame written to the FIFO interface and all bits of the destination address set to '1'.
0x0000007c.name: TxCIfOutBroadCastPkts

0x00000000.description: Mac Ethernet Port Stats for Segment %d
0x00000000.name: MacEthPortStatsSeg%d

0x00000000.description: Bits 31:0 of count. All octets received except preamble (i.e. Header, Payload, Padding and FCS) for all frames and pause frames received.
0x00000000.name: RxPIfInOctetsLo

0x00000004.description: Bits 39:32 of count. All octets received except preamble (i.e. Header, Payload, Padding and FCS) for all frames and pause frames received
0x00000004.name: RxPIfInOctetsHi

0x00000008.description: Frame received exceeded the maximum length programmed in register FRM_LENGTH.
0x00000008.name: RxFrameTooLongErrors

0x0000000c.description: A count of frames with a length/type field value between 46 (VLAN: 42) and less than 0x0600, that does not match the number of payload data octets received. Should count also if length/type field is less than 46 (VLAN: 42) and the frame is longer than 64 bytes.
0x0000000c.name: RxInRangeLengthErrors

0x00000014.description: Number of frames received with error: FIFO Overflow Error, CRC Error, Frame Too Long Error, Alignment Error, The dedicated Error Code (0xfe, not a code error) was received.
0x00000014.name: RxPIfInErrors

0x00000018.description: Incremented with each valid frame received on the Receive FIFO interface and all bits of the destination address were set to '1'.
0x00000018.name: RxPIfInBroadCastPkts

0x0000001c.description: Counts the number of dropped packets due to internal errors of the MAC Client. Occurs when a Receive FIFO overflow condition persists.
0x0000001c.name: RxPStatsDropEvents

0x00000020.description: Frame received with an alignment error.
0x00000020.name: RxAlignmentErrors

0x00000028.description: Frame received without error (including pause frames).
0x00000028.name: RxFramesReceivedOK

0x0000002c.description: CRC-32 Error is detected but the frame is otherwise of correct length.
0x0000002c.name: RxFrameCheckSequenceErrors

0x00000030.description: Incremented with each valid frame received on the Receive FIFO interface and bit 0 of the destination address was '0'.
0x00000030.name: RxPIfInUniCastPkts

0x00000034.description: Incremented with each valid frame received on the Receive FIFO interface and bit 0 of the destination address was '1' but not the broadcast address (all bits set to '1'). Pause frames are not counted.
0x00000034.name: RxPIfInMultiCastPkts

0x00000038.description: Total number of packets received. Good and bad packets.
0x00000038.name: RxPStatsPkts

0x0000003c.description: Total number of packets that were less than 64 octets long with a good CRC. Note: Undersize packets are not delivered to the FIFO interface.
0x0000003c.name: RxPStatsUndersizePkts

0x00000040.description: Incremented when a packet of 64 octets length is received (good and bad frames are counted).
0x00000040.name: RxPStatsPkts64octets

0x00000044.description: Frames (good and bad) with 65 to 127 octets.
0x00000044.name: RxPStatsPkts65to127octets

0x00000048.description: Frames (good and bad) with 512 to 1023 octets.
0x00000048.name: RxPStatsPkts512to1023octets

0x0000004c.description: Frames (good and bad) with 1024 to 1518 octets.
0x0000004c.name: RxPStatsPkts1024to1518octets

0x00000050.description: Total number of packets longer than the valid maximum length programmed in register FRM_LENGTH (excluding framing bits, but including FCS octets), and with a bad Frame Check Sequence.
0x00000050.name: RxPStatsJabbers

0x00000054.description: Total number of packets that were less than 64 octets long with a wrong CRC. Note: Fragments are not delivered to the FIFO interface.
0x00000054.name: RxPStatsFragments

0x00000058.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for class 2.
0x00000058.name: RxCBFCPauseFramesReceived2

0x0000005c.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for class 3.
0x0000005c.name: RxCBFCPauseFramesReceived3

0x00000060.description: Frames (good and bad) with 128 to 255 octets.
0x00000060.name: RxPStatsPkts128to255octets

0x00000064.description: Frames (good and bad) with 256 to 511 octets.
0x00000064.name: RxPStatsPkts256to511octets

0x00000068.description: Proprietary RMON extension counter that counts the number of frames with 1519 bytes to the maximum length programmed in register FRM_LENGTH.
0x00000068.name: RxPStatsPkts1519toMaxoctets

0x0000006c.description: Total number of packets longer than the valid maximum length programmed in register FRM_LENGTH (excluding framing bits, but including FCS octets), and with a good Frame Check Sequence.
0x0000006c.name: RxPStatsOversizePkts

0x00000070.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for class 0
0x00000070.name: RxCBFCPauseFramesReceived0

0x00000074.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for class 1.
0x00000074.name: RxCBFCPauseFramesReceived1

0x00000078.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for class 4.
0x00000078.name: RxCBFCPauseFramesReceived4

0x0000007c.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for class 5.
0x0000007c.name: RxCBFCPauseFramesReceived5

0x00000080.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for class 6.
0x00000080.name: RxCBFCPauseFramesReceived6

0x00000084.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for class 7.
0x00000084.name: RxCBFCPauseFramesReceived7

0x000000a0.description: Bits 31:0 of count. All octets transmitted except preamble (i.e. Header, Payload, Padding and FCS) for all valid frames and valid pause frames transmitted.
0x000000a0.name: TxPIfOutOctetsLo

0x000000a4.description: Bits 39:32 of count. All octets transmitted except preamble (i.e. Header, Payload, Padding and FCS) for all valid frames and valid pause frames transmitted. Valid pause frame transmitted.for 24bit (TxCounter24)
0x000000a4.name: TxPIfOutOctetsHi

0x000000ac.description: Number of frames transmitted with error: FIFO Overflow Error, FIFO Underflow Error, or User application defined error (ff_tx_err asserted together with ff_tx_eop).
0x000000ac.name: TxPIfOutErrors

0x000000b0.description: Incremented with each frame written to the FIFO interface and all bits of the destination address set to '1'.
0x000000b0.name: TxPIfOutBroadCastPkts

0x000000b4.description: Incremented when a packet of 64 octets length is received (good and bad frames are counted).
0x000000b4.name: TxPStatsPkts64octets

0x000000b8.description: Frames (good and bad) with 256 to 511 octets.
0x000000b8.name: TxPStatsPkts256to511octets

0x000000bc.description: Frames (good and bad) with 512 to 1023 octets.
0x000000bc.name: TxPStatsPkts512to1023octets

0x000000c4.description: Frame transmitted without error (including pause frames).
0x000000c4.name: TxFramesTransmittedOK

0x000000c8.description: Incremented with each frame written to the FIFO interface and bit 0 of the destination address set to '0'.
0x000000c8.name: TxPIfOutUniCastPkts

0x000000cc.description: Incremented with each frame written to the FIFO interface and bit 0 of the destination address set to '1' but not the broadcast address (all bits set to '1').
0x000000cc.name: TxPIfOutMultiCastPkts

0x000000d0.description: Frames (good and bad) with 65 to 127 octets.
0x000000d0.name: TxPStatsPkts65to127octets

0x000000d4.description: Frames (good and bad) with 128 to 255 octets.
0x000000d4.name: TxPStatsPkts128to255octets

0x000000d8.description: Frames (good and bad) with 1024 to 1518 octets.
0x000000d8.name: TxPStatsPkts1024to1518octets

0x000000dc.description: Frames (good and bad) with 1519 to MAX octets.
0x000000dc.name: TxPStatsPkts1518toMAXoctets

0x000000e0.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for class 0
0x000000e0.name: TxCBFCPauseFramesTransmitted0

0x000000e4.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for class 1.
0x000000e4.name: TxCBFCPauseFramesTransmitted1

0x000000e8.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for class 4.
0x000000e8.name: TxCBFCPauseFramesTransmitted4

0x000000ec.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for class 5.
0x000000ec.name: TxCBFCPauseFramesTransmitted5

0x000000f0.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for class 2.
0x000000f0.name: TxCBFCPauseFramesTransmitted2

0x000000f4.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for class 3.
0x000000f4.name: TxCBFCPauseFramesTransmitted3

0x000000f8.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for class 6.
0x000000f8.name: TxCBFCPauseFramesTransmitted6

0x000000fc.description: CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for class 7.
0x000000fc.name: TxCBFCPauseFramesTransmitted7

0x00000000.description: Mac Ethernet Port Stats for Hydra %d
0x00000000.name: MacEthPortStatsHyd%d
